data.text: This is Benji. He has no time to explain but he needs you to follow him. 12/10 would drop everything immediately https://t.co/3krf4Vjf69

media.alt_text: a small, brown, furry dachshund puppy is walking with purpose on a trail in the woods. he's making direct eye contact with you, and the tips of his ears are flipped up in motion. one of his front paws is raised mid-step because he literally doesn't have time to stop
